annotations.description: A Manhattan Variation from that time in NYC when Manhattan Variations were the cutting edge of the newly established cocktail “Renaissance”. These variations...
annotations.title: Modern Classic: Little Italy

textContent:
2oz (60ml) Rye
.75oz (22.5ml) Sweet Vermouth
.5oz (15ml) Cynar
Garnish with cherry

Stir and strain into coupe
Drop in the cherry

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=WSjFCVQuwP0
title: Little Italy
